title: Purchasing and Leavebuster
body: I had a glitch where it stopped me from entering a game. Leavebuster is now giving me a warning because of it which is really enraging me. I also got charged with a fee for riot points which I didn't get.

replies.body: If you see that *glitch* again, please let me know so we can troubleshoot it. Have you received the RP that you purchased yet, or is there still a delay?
i have received the purchase, it is fine now, just it had me worried for a little while
also, can you add like another warning for the leave buster since i got kicked because of a glitch and therefore wasn't able to rejoin the match?
